name: Volcanic Dragon: Obsidian Predator
flavor: A massive winged creature with obsidian scales and impossibly sharp claws.

features.name: Relentless (2) - Passive
features.desc: Can be spotlighted up to two times per GM turn. Spend Fear as usual to spotlight.

features.name: Obsidian Tail - Action
features.desc: Mark a Stress to make attack against all targets within Close range. Success: 4d6+4 physical damage, knocked to Far range and Vulnerable until next roll with Hope.

features.name: Dive-Bomb - Action
features.desc: If flying, mark a Stress to choose point within Far range, move there, attack all targets within Very Close range; on success, 2d10+6 physical, mark a Stress, lose a Hope.

features.name: Erupting Rage (Phase Change) - Reaction
features.desc: When marks last HP, replace with Molten Scourge and immediately spotlight.
